                                        value: "0",

                                    },

                                    name: "foo",

                            ),

                                        value: "bar",

                                        ),
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                        ),
                    },

                    PropertyFetch {
                        target: Variable(

                                    name: "foo",

                        target: Variable(
